name: Ylilauta Icy Terminal
description:
Icy theme for Ylilauta based on the standard Terminal theme.

You need to use the Terminal theme on Ylilauta for this to work correctly(change it in preferences)

It should work with most of the content on Ylilauta. I use it myself so if something is changed that breaks the style I'll update it.
